about_the_game:
Epstein

Type: Survival / Adventure

Description:
In Epstein Island, players prepare for a mysterious and dangerous survival and exploration journey on an island! They uncover dark secrets and have perilous missions. By defeating various creatures on Epstein Island, reach the Mini Bosses. There will be 3 Mini Bosses on the island, each located in different regions and dropping different items. The first Mini Boss is Clintin, the second Mini Boss is Havking, and the third Mini Boss is Minwell.

After defeating these individuals and gaining strength, you need to defeat the final Boss, Jefry, who rules over the island. However, be careful and improve your base with your friends on the island and launch attacks. Find the magic elements in the hidden areas of the island and use them! MJ's found within the island will assist you; seek their help instead of trying to harm them, as they will be your allies!

Features:

Build and Upgrade Your Base:

Strengthen yourself on the island by building your own base. Enhance your home and character with new weapons and mechanics you learn, becoming even stronger!

Fish, Breed Animals, and Produce Meat. Survive!:

As you develop yourself on the island, your character will get hungry. You can fish by making a rod and using worms from the soil as bait with a shovel. Build a farm for pigs and chickens, feeding them with their favorite fruits to produce meat. Be careful! Don't forget to cook the meats.

Find the Temple's Code and Defeat the Boss!


Experience realistic survival in a mysterious and dangerous island environment.
Engage in a dark and immersive storyline filled with mysteries for players to explore.
Combat challenges with morbiders and other formidable foes.
Form strategic alliances and interactions with other survivors.
A dynamic game world where your decisions significantly impact the storyline.

content_descriptors.notes: "The game takes place on an island and in the tunnels area. When you hit morbid and mutant people, blood effects appear."

short_description: Survive a mysterious island and thwart the sinister plans of Jefry in "Epstein". Battle the blood-dependent morbiders and forge alliances with other survivors to confront Jefry in his grand temple. Master survival tactics and strategic gameplay in this intense adventure.
